name: Bill's Brown Garlic Rice
instructions: Rinse rice until water runs clear and soak for 8-12 hours.
Heat pot using sauté setting for 1 minute. Add oil and swirl to coat.
Add chopped garlic and rice. Sauté for 5-7 minutes until golden, stirring frequently.
Add water, secure the lid, and close the pressure valve.
Cook on high pressure for 22 minutes. Naturally release pressure for 10 minutes, then release any remaining pressure.
Fluff rice with a fork and serve.
